attributes.action: Allow blood transfusions for people who have had blood transfusions since 1980
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am currently unable to give blood due to the fact that I received a blood transfusion in 1993 when I was 4.  This is due to the risk from Mad Cow Disease being passed through blood transfusions although this has yet to be scientifically proved and is a mere assumption.  I am angered by this as they are always asking for more donations of blood and like me there will be lots of people out there who are unable to donate due to this law.
